svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - September 23 2023
September 23 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
September 23, 2023" date: "2023-09-23"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Devnet-9 planned for September 27, will include KZG
ceremony values if ready Public testnet upgrade order changed: Goerli to be first as itâ€™s deprecated, allows testing 3/6 (target/max)
EIP4844 blobs, ideally before Devconnect
Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
â€¢ Devnet-9 planned for September 27, will include KZG ceremony values if ready
Devnet-9 planned for September 27, will include KZG ceremony values if ready
â€¢ Public testnet upgrade order changed: Goerli to be first as itâ€™s deprecated, allows testing 3/6 (target/max) EIP4844 blobs, ideally
before Devconnect
Public testnet upgrade order changed: Goerli to be first as itâ€™s deprecated, allows testing 3/6 (target/max) EIP4844 blobs, ideally before
Devconnect
â€¢ Dencun testing call video .Â Notes from Terence
Dencun testing call video .Â Notes from Terence
â€¢ Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.2 : adds EIP7514 (max churn limit) and fork-choice rule proposer boost adjustment
Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.2 : adds EIP7514 (max churn limit) and fork-choice rule proposer boost adjustment
Prague + Electra upgrade
â€¢ Terence: Electra focus should be improving consensus layer stability , inclusion list, increasing max effective balance (EIP7251) and
improving fork choice
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.23% still far too close to risky 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.23% still far too close to risky 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer:
Prysm over 33%, a bug could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm over 33%, a bug could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm over 33%, a bug could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Need more geographic diversity for both stakers and nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
Need more geographic diversity for both stakers and nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU

For Stakers

Client releases

: HoleÅ¡ky testnet new genesis

EIPs/Standards

networks)
EIPs

EIP7519 : Atomic storage operations SCREDIT and SDEBIT

EIP7523 : Empty accounts deprecation (prohibit empty accounts on post-merge networks)
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7520 : zk-SNARK public inputs overflow protection ERC7521 : General intents for contract wallets ERC7522 :
OIDC (OpenID Connect) zk verifier for Account Abstraction (ERC4337)

â€¢ ERC7520 : zk-SNARK public inputs overflow protection

ERC7522 : OIDC (OpenID Connect) zk verifier for Account Abstraction (ERC4337)
Lido is a systemic threat to ETH: interview with Danny Ryan
Lido is a systemic threat to Ethereum.Â You won't want to miss this episode with Danny Ryan. (Watch on YouTube )
Danny also covers the death of VDFs, EIP7514 (max epoch churn limit) and EIP7251 (increase max effective balance).
Stuff for developers
â€¢ HoleÅ¡ky testnet genesis rescheduled for September 28
HoleÅ¡ky testnet genesis rescheduled for September 28
â€¢ Truffle & Ganache are being sunset , devs can migrate to Hardhat
Truffle & Ganache are being sunset , devs can migrate to Hardhat
â€¢ Foundry: Rivet (developer wallet) adds log & calldata decoding Tstore-template : Foundry template with custom solc binaries that support
transient storage opcodes in inline assembly
Foundry:
â€¢ Rivet (developer wallet) adds log & calldata decoding
Rivet (developer wallet) adds log & calldata decoding
â€¢ Tstore-template : Foundry template with custom solc binaries that support transient storage opcodes in inline assembly
Tstore-template : Foundry template with custom solc binaries that support transient storage opcodes in inline assembly

Emily : Solidity library for credible commitments
â€¢ Speed Run Ethereum updated to Scaffold-ETH-2, can use Hardhat or Foundry

Alchemy University Learn Solidity : 11 browser based lessons

OP Viem : viem extension for OP Stack networks

this week

â€¢ DeFiSaver automates using Liquity to earn Maker DSR interest

â€¢ GammaSwap : onchain options of Sushi pools, live on Arbitrum. Market makers can hedge AMM LP positions
GammaSwap : onchain options of Sushi pools, live on Arbitrum. Market makers can hedge AMM LP positions
â€¢ Vampire attacking CEX: Infinex to allow traders to earn an airdrop from derivative CEX trading history

real time.
